Path.configRoot.doc: the full path or relative to api directory where data is stored
Path.dataRoot.doc: the relative to config root path to the data
Path.imageRoot.doc: the relative to config root path to the image
Path.logRoot.doc: the relative to config root path to the logging
Path.siteRoot.doc: the relative to config root path to the place where the static site is served from
Path.tempDataRoot.doc: location where the uploaded files are temporary stored
Path.mediaRoot.doc: The global images, if there are not available

Board.mediaPrefix.doc: the prefix for default images: mediaPrefix + layout+ Rand()
